about_the_game: The second of our four DLCs, Save The Farmland, allows access to the farmland, graveyard, and orchard. Discover the mystery behind the fog covering the farm. Upgrade your weapons to battle the Evil Ones. Put the dead back to rest and free the farmland from the tyranny of the Evil Ones. Don't get lost in the cornfield: find loose ears of corn to help mark your way through the maze of paths.
detailed_description: The second of our four DLCs, Save The Farmland, allows access to the farmland, graveyard, and orchard. Discover the mystery behind the fog covering the farm. Upgrade your weapons to battle the Evil Ones. Put the dead back to rest and free the farmland from the tyranny of the Evil Ones. Don't get lost in the cornfield: find loose ears of corn to help mark your way through the maze of paths.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio Codec - Stereo
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Surround Sound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio Codec - Stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad Core 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Surround Sound

short_description: The second of our four DLCs, Save The Farmland, allows access to the farmland, graveyard, and orchard. Discover the mystery behind the fog covering the farm. Upgrade your weapons to battle the Evil Ones. Put the dead back to rest and free the farmland from the tyranny of the Evil Ones.
